participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of falling off my skateboard and getting hurt.
i have an older brother who plays football in the nfl.
I love listening to punk music to help me cope with the stress of my life.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
i love to recycle.

participant_2.background:
After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

content.text: Not bad! Just chilling and listening to some music
Nice! What are you listening to?
I'm listening to some punk music. It really helps me cope with stress
Oh cool! I like punk music too! Who are you listening to?
I'm listening to The Offspring right now. They're my favorite band
Oh nice! I love The Offspring! They're one of my favorite bands too!
Sweet! What are your other favorite bands?
I also like Rancid, NOFX, and Blink 182
Oh nice! I like all those bands too!
Cool! We should totally hang out sometime and listen to music together!
That sounds like fun! I'd love to!
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans later
Sounds good! I'll message you my number.
